attributes.action: Make hiring temps after redundancies (to cover the position) a criminal offence
attributes.background: Made redundant then temps hired in my position straight away. I would like more rights for workers and for companies to have to have an appeals procedure.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. It's clear that you would like changes to workers' rights. Its not clear whether you would like a new criminal offence, an appeals procedure for redundancies or both. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
